Comparison of rsid vs chr:pos lookup in ElasticSearch

Gibran Hemani

Source: vignettes/timings.Rmd
timings.Rmd
library(knitr)
library(pander)
library(microbenchmark)
library(ieugwasr)
#> API: public: http://gwas-api.mrcieu.ac.uk/

Get a set of SNPs too query:

a <- tophits("ieu-a-2")
rsid <- a$rsid
chrpos <- paste0(a$chr, ":", a$position)
length(rsid)
#> [1] 79

1. Comparison of rsid lookup vs chromosome:position 

mbm <- microbenchmark("rsid" = {
        b <- associations(rsid, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    },
    "chrpos" = {
        b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    }, times=10
)
#> Warning in microbenchmark(rsid = {: less accurate nanosecond times to avoid
#> potential integer overflows
kable(summary(mbm))
expr min lq mean median uq max neval
rsid 75.681 107.3962 902.0099 494.2979 1461.558 3512.133 10
chrpos 148.840 282.4894 1582.1836 594.6462 1390.574 9296.395 10

2. Single range query

Specify a range, and then get the corresponding rsIDs in that range

radius <- 100000
chrpos <- paste0(a$chr[1], ":", a$position[1]-100000, "-", a$position[1]+100000)
b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
rsid <- b$rsid

This is a 200,000 size window, which has 586 variants to lookup.

mbm <- microbenchmark("rsid" = {
        b <- associations(rsid, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    },
    "chrpos" = {
        b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    }, times=10
)
kable(summary(mbm))
expr min lq mean median uq max neval
rsid 227.6788 252.1875 881.5181 496.1831 726.6548 3210.358 10
chrpos 159.7290 260.5227 937.6075 420.2040 1485.5964 2849.180 10

3. Multiple range queries

Specify multiple ranges, and then get the corresponding rsIDs across all those ranges

chrpos <- paste0(a$chr, ":", a$position-10000, "-", a$position+10000)
b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
rsid <- b$rsid

This 79 ranges of 20,000 size window, which is covered by 4508 variants to lookup.

mbm <- microbenchmark("rsid" = {
        b <- associations(rsid, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    },
    "chrpos" = {
        b <- associations(chrpos, "ieu-a-7", proxies=0)
    }, times=5
)
kable(summary(mbm))
expr min lq mean median uq max neval
rsid 3.034648 9.193800 26.21005 15.671379 21.24709 81.90334 5
chrpos 2.303980 5.153764 21.77656 6.611598 45.29050 49.52298 5
